author: Justin Carter
title: So Long, ‘Anthem,’ See Ya In the Skies
description: From its troubled start to short finish, BioWare's sci-fi looter-shooter 'Anthem' was a winner, loser, and everything in-between.
content: In February 2019, Dragon Age and Mass Effect developer BioWare released Anthem, a third-person shooter about human Freelancers donning armored Javelin suits to fight monsters and various factions. Af… [+5891 chars]
